description: This file contains source code for a Wi-Fi configuration encoder in C, including functions to encode various Wi-Fi configuration structures into JSON format for web-based configuration or reporting. It manages encoding of radio configurations, VAP (Virtual Access Point) settings, security profiles, interworking, radius server configurations, and client association data. The code references external libraries such as cJSON for JSON handling and includes various Wi-Fi-specific data structures, suggesting its role in a Wi-Fi network device firmware or management software.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_radio_setup_object(const rdk_wifi_vap_map_t * vap_map,cJSON * radio_object)
methods.description: Encodes radio setup information into JSON, including vap map details.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_radio_object(const rdk_wifi_radio_t * radio,cJSON * radio_object)
methods.description: Encodes detailed information about a radio, including frequency band, channels, power, and radar info.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_vap_common_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_object)
methods.description: Encodes common VAP properties such as name, bridge, radio index, mode, and security settings.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_postassoc_object(const wifi_postassoc_control_t * postassoc_info,cJSON * postassoc)
methods.description: Encodes post-association control parameters into JSON.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_preassoc_object(const wifi_preassoc_control_t * preassoc_info,cJSON * preassoc)
methods.description: Encodes pre-association control parameters into JSON.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_connection_ctrl_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes connection control information for a VAP, including pre- and post-association rules.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_gas_config(const wifi_GASConfiguration_t * gas_info,cJSON * gas_obj)
methods.description: Encodes GAS (Generic Advertisement Service) configuration details.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_wifi_global_config(const wifi_global_param_t * global_info,cJSON * global_obj)
methods.description: Encodes global Wi-Fi configuration parameters.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_config_object(const wifi_global_config_t * config_info,cJSON * config_obj)
methods.description: Encodes overall Wi-Fi configuration, including GAS and global parameters.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_anqp_object(const char * vap_name,cJSON * inter,const unsigned char * anqp)
methods.description: Encodes ANQP (Access Network Query Protocol) data related to Passpoint and Hotspot 2.0.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_passpoint_object(const char * vap_name,cJSON * inter,const unsigned char * passpoint)
methods.description: Encodes Passpoint-specific data.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_interworking_common_object(const wifi_interworking_t * interworking_info,cJSON * interworking)
methods.description: Encodes interworking parameters, including venue and access network type.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_radius_object(const wifi_radius_settings_t * radius_info,cJSON * radius)
methods.description: Encodes RADIUS server configuration details.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_security_object(const wifi_vap_security_t * security_info,cJSON * security,bool is_6g)
methods.description: Encodes security mode, encryption, and radius settings for a Wi-Fi interface.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_hotspot_open_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a hotspot open configuration for a VAP, including security and interworking.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_hotspot_secure_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a secure hotspot configuration for a VAP.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_lnf_psk_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes LNF (Likely a product-specific) PSK VAP configuration.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_lnf_radius_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes LNF Radius VAP configuration, including security and interworking.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_mesh_backhaul_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes mesh backhaul VAP configuration, reusing the private vap object encoder.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_iot_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes IoT-specific VAP configuration.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_private_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a private VAP configuration, including security and interworking.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_mesh_vap_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a mesh VAP, reusing the private VAP encoder.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_scan_params_object(const wifi_scan_params_t * scan_info,cJSON * scan_obj)
methods.description: Encodes scan parameters such as period and channel.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_mesh_sta_object(const wifi_vap_info_t * vap_info,const rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * vap_obj)
methods.description: Encodes mesh station details, including BSSID and security.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_associated_client_object(rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * assoc_array,assoclist_type_t assoclist_type)
methods.description: Encodes a list of clients associated with a VAP.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_mac_object(rdk_wifi_vap_info_t * rdk_vap_info,cJSON * obj_array)
methods.description: Encodes MAC filtering list for a VAP.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_levl_object(const levl_config_t * levl,cJSON * levl_obj)
methods.description: Encodes LEVL (Likely a measurement or configuration) client info.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_blaster_object(const active_msmt_t * blaster_info,cJSON * blaster_obj)
methods.description: Encodes active measurement information.

methods.name: encode_blaster_object
methods.description: Encodes active measurement (blaster) information and steps into JSON, including packet size, duration, count, enable status, plan ID, steps with source/destination MAC addresses, status, MQTT topic, and trace headers.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_wifivapcap(wifi_interface_name_idex_map_t * interface_map,cJSON * hal_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a Wi-Fi VAP interface mapping into a JSON object, including names, indices, interface and bridge names, and VLAN IDs.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_wifiradiointerfacecap(radio_interface_mapping_t * radio_interface_map,cJSON * hal_obj)
methods.description: Encodes radio interface mapping details into JSON, including physical and radio indices and interface names.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_csi_object(queue_t * csi_queue,cJSON * csi_obj)
methods.description: Encodes CSI (Channel State Information) data from a queue into a JSON array, including session IDs, enable flags, and client MAC addresses.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_wifiradiocap(wifi_platform_property_t * wifi_prop,cJSON * radio_obj,int numRadios)
methods.description: Encodes Wi-Fi radio capabilities, including supported channels, channel widths, and radio presence for each radio interface.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_stats_config_object(hash_map_t * stats_map,cJSON * st_arr_obj)
methods.description: Encodes a hash map of statistics configuration entries into a JSON array, detailing types, intervals, and channel lists.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_steering_config_object(hash_map_t * steer_map,cJSON * st_arr_obj)
methods.description: Encodes band steering configuration entries from a hash map into a JSON array, including VAP names, utilization parameters, debugging options, and thresholds.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_steering_clients_object(hash_map_t * steer_clients_map,cJSON * st_arr_obj)
methods.description: Encodes information about band steering clients, including various parameters, key-value pairs, and client-specific counters, into a JSON array.

methods.name: webconfig_error_t encode_vif_neighbors_object(hash_map_t * neighbors_map,cJSON * neighbor_arr_obj)
methods.description: Encodes neighbor BSS information for VIFs into a JSON array, including BSSID, interface name, channel, HT mode, and priority.

ctags.name: encode_anqp_object
ctags.pattern: /^webconfig_error_t encode_anqp_object(const char *vap_name, cJSON *inter,const unsigned char* anq/
ctags.signature: (const char * vap_name,cJSON * inter,const unsigned char * anqp)

ctags.name: encode_passpoint_object
ctags.signature: (const char * vap_name,cJSON * inter,const unsigned char * passpoint)
